dialogue: [font_size=48]Finding [color=yellow]your family[/color] with broken wings is [font_size=64]NOT[/font_size] going to be easy.[/font_size]
[font_size=48]They're called [color=#36c5f4]Glow Worms[/color]. They're kinda like you actually with the [color=#36c5f4]glowing[/color] and all.[/font_size]
[font_size=64]You're gonna need every [color=yellow]trick[/color] in the book[/font_size]
